Row.Text: I don't recognize your face. Are you a foreign diplomat, or are you here to end your days on my altar?
And now it ends. I look forward to meeting Huitzilopochtli for myself.
Ah, is it time for war already? I'll marshal the troops, then.
A public Declaration of Friendship would be in our mutual interest, I believe.
Your wretched empire is known for naught but blasphemy. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
The altars are dry. My flower wars must begin again.
You've claimed quite a lot of land! It all looks very tempting to capture.
What did you need? I was in the middle of a ritual.
A pleasure to see you! Let us celebrate this occasion with a sacrifice.
Welcome back to the mighty halls of the Aztec empire!
Bold of you to come before my altar. Surely know what happens to people like you in this room?
Those are some fine-looking soldiers you've trained! Huitzilopochtli would be quite pleased to have their blood.
Tell me, then.
I will not mourn what I have lost; the men who died under my command enjoyed an honorable death, and are now with Huitzilopochtli.
Your luxuries intrigue me. Let us trade, carefully and precisely, such that our riches go only to those who deserve them.
This is no mere flower war; I cannot rest until you are annihilated.
What say you to an Open Borders agreement? My men are interested in learning how their allies live.
You shall not change my mind.
Normally I turn to Huitzilopochtli to help me in times of crisis, but the situation has deteriorated enough that I must request earthly aid as well.
Such disrespect! I would be pleased to see your head on my skull rack.
The gods are not yet satisfied.
This war has been a great success; much blood has been shed in Huitzilopochtli's name. I hope you have found it equally fruitful.
我不認識你的臉！你是外國外交官，還是來我的祭壇結束生命的？
現在一切結束了,我期待親自去見胡伊茨洛波奇特利...
啊，戰爭已經開始了？那我就召集軍隊吧。
我相信，公開宣布結盟對我們雙方都有利。
你們那可悲的帝國除了褻瀆神明外一無是處。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]他們已經公開譴責我們！注意：你並未處於戰爭狀態。[ENDCOLOR])
祭壇已經乾涸。我的花之戰爭必須再次開始。
你已經占領了相當多的土地！它們看起來都十分誘人，值得去奪取。
你有什麼事？我正在舉行儀式。
很高興見到你！讓我們用一場獻祭來慶祝這個場合吧。
歡迎回到阿茲特克帝國宏偉的大廳！
你膽子很大，敢來到我的祭壇前。你肯定知道像你這樣的人在這個房間裏會發生什麼吧？
你訓練的士兵看起來相當不錯！胡伊茨洛波奇特利會很樂意看到他們的鮮血。
說吧。
我不會為失去的東西而悲傷；在我指揮下死去的人享受了光榮的死亡，現在他們與胡伊茨洛波奇特利同在。
你的奢侈品引起了我的興趣。讓我們謹慎而精確地進行貿易，確保我們的財富隻流向那些值得擁有它們的人。
這並非普通的花之戰爭；我不會停手，直到你被徹底消滅。
你認為開放邊界協議如何？我的人對了解盟友的生活方式很感興趣。
你無法改變我的主意。
通常我在危機時刻會向胡伊茨洛波奇特利求助，但局勢已經惡化到我必須請求世俗援助的地步。
如此不敬！我很樂意看到你的頭顱掛在我的骷髏架上。
神明還未滿足。
這場戰爭取得了巨大成功；以胡伊茨洛波奇特利的名義流了許多血。我希望你也能從中受益。
